name: Cat in Space (WIP)
description:
Cat in Space is a WIP platforming game made in GB Studio.

Made for the 31st December 2020 Cat Jam with themes "Sci Fi" and "The end is from the start".

Cat must find the key in each level, which activates all sorts of traps and dangers. Cat then has to travel back to the beginning of the level to find the crystal.

Plans:

What I plan on doing:

  • Adding level splash screens
  • Menus maybe
  • people to talk to
  • short back story
  • add a couple more levels
  • Fixing bugs
Credits:

I used this tileset by AblazePython, it's very good.
